strengths: Exploration dominance — Distant Suns lets mechs draw 2 exploration cards and pick 1
Fabrication converts relic fragments into relics or command tokens
Strong starting fleet (2 carriers, 1 destroyer, 2 fighters, 1 mech, 3 infantry) — better than 2c4i start
Eidolon mech functions as both a ship during transport and ground force during invasion
Agent allows re-exploration of already-discovered planets
weaknesses: Depends on exploration luck to some degree
Mech-dependent — losing mechs hurts exploration advantage
tips: Always explore with mechs when possible — Distant Suns gives choice between 2 cards
Use Fabrication flexibly: 2 same-type fragments = relic, or 1 fragment = command token
Agent can re-explore planets — squeeze extra value from known worlds
Hero grants a free relic + 2 strategy card secondaries without tokens — massive swing turn
Commander unlocks with mechs in 3 systems — gives exploration card when capturing planets
Focus on archaeological advantages and diplomatic flexibility over raw tech

techPaths.name: Exploration-focused
techPaths.note: Core identity is exploration, not tech; prioritize unit upgrades that support mech deployment
